media:group.media:title: 7 Dangers of Legalism vs Grace (Sermon)
media:group.media:description:
Church sermon produced by 3ABN with Jill Morikone. There seems to be a lot of confusion in the area of grace and legalism. For example, are we saved by works? If not what role do works play in the life of a christian? Where is the balance of trusting and believing in Jesus and rejecting the message of the Bible to walk as Jesus walked? The Bible teaches that we can have assurance of salvation and free of guilt. Join 3ABN Vice President/COO Jill Morikone as she opens the Bible to teach us about grace and legalism.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.
â¡ï¸SUBSCRIBE https://bit.ly/3ABN_Subscribe

media:group.media:description:
Join us today as Andy & Naomi Weaver (previously Amish) and Gerry Wagoner (previously German Baptist) tell their testimony about how they became Seventh-day Adventists. Hosted by John Dinzey, Andy and Gerry will share how they are reaching the Amish community, Mennonites and others. You will enjoy listening to their testimonies and all the things their ministry, West Salem Mission, is doing to win souls for Christ.Â
Learn more at: https://www.westsalemmission.org/

entry.title: Who is Suppressing the Truth | 3ABN Worship Hour

media:group.media:title: Who is Suppressing the Truth | 3ABN Worship Hour
media:group.media:description:
Live church sermon produced by 3ABN with Kenny Shelton. Are you suppressing the Seventh-day Adventist truth? The Bible says to whom much is given much is required. Don't cover up the straight testimony of truth so preciously revealed to you by God otherwise you. We have far more to fear from within than from without. The hindrance to strength and success are far greater from the church itself than from the world. Join Pastor Kenny Shelton as he opens the Bible to teach us about Seventh-day Adventist revival and reformation.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.
